title: Researcher, PhD Candidate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi
Interview Descriptions: Short listed on the basis of valid gate score, after that written test has been scheduled for 1 hour. After qualifying in it, the interview has been scheduled to test fundamentals and specified research work
Interview Questions: Check the knowlege of fundamental subjects and Area of research

title: Research Scholar Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi
Interview Descriptions: After clearing the written exam, you will be shortlisted for interview. For qualification in written exam minimum 50% marks is required. GATE qualified students can also apply. Students form various national level universities will get chance to interviewed. directly.
Interview Questions:
Question regarding your master thesis.
Questions regarding your research proposal.

title: PhD Scholar Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: They mainly focused on my basic concepts. Since I applied for PhD post in Microwave Engineering, hence they asked me about the basic concepts of EM Theory, Microwave Technology. If you have your concepts crystal clear, then they will appreciate you and easily offer you the post of PhD or JRF whichever you have applied for.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi
Interview Descriptions: Good and tricky questions were asked and knowledgeable pannel. Rigorous analysis of the knowledge. Past publications were discussed. Research intrest was tested with good quality questions. Asked to write a research proposal on the project.
Interview Questions: Describe the research area of interest.

title: Training and Placement Officer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi
Interview Descriptions: It was good, we were called one by one and the interview went on for around 1 hour. It was a great experience and i had fun. I was called with one of my friend after 12 O'clock, his turn was first and he went inside, while i waited in the freezing hall of the hostel in the winter of Varanasi. After around 1.5 hours it was my turn, and it went till 3 in the morning,  i had fun.

title: Research Intern Interview

Interview Descriptions: Telephonic Interview- Discussed my previous projects, future directions, projects  I wanted to work on, and if my interests match with that of the professors. It was a fairly easy process

title: Mtech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi (Vāranāsi) in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions:
personal interview and written exam. questions in written exam were a mix bag of operatiin research,financial engg,project management and few questions of aptitude.interview was easy
all questions were basic.panel was quite helpful.major weightage of written exam.gate score was required only for shortlisting for written.it had no role in final selection.written was eliminatory with min 55% marks
Interview Questions: basics of operation research,quality management,production planning and management

title: Coding Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Round-robin of inteviews. Three people total for their 'superday'. Each person is assigned a different category to interview. They included: personality, background, and technical.
The technical interview consisted of writing out code for several different algorithms. I was asked to write out a function that traverses through a linked list in reverse minimizing the amount of times through.
Interview Questions: Write out the code to print out all the values of a linked-list in reverse.

title: Teaching Assistance Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi (Noida) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was firstly conducted written test and it was processed by interview.Written test basically conducted by covering Digital Electronics , General Aptitude and Verilog Coding. Orientation of test was around R&D on Digital Electronics.

Interview process is very simple:- 1) Technical Process 2) Managerial Process
Technical Process include all technical skill like Java and database some time ask Front end and Back end. some time they ask java feature like java inheritance, polymorphism and abstraction, class and object.
